scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp *.html *.css *.js *.json *.png sw.js dist/ && sed -i 's|__OCR_API_KEY__|'$OCR_API_KEY'|g' dist/app.js && sed -i 's|__FIREBASE_API_KEY__|'$FIREBASE_API_KEY'|g' dist/app.js && sed -i 's|__FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN__|'$FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN'|g' dist/app.js && sed -i 's|__FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID__|'$FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID'|g' dist/app.js && sed -i 's|__FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET__|'$FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET'|g' dist/app.js && sed -i 's|__FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID__|'$FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID'|g' dist/app.js && sed -i 's|__FIREBASE_APP_ID__|'$FIREBASE_APP_ID'|g' dist/app.js && sed -i 's|__FIREBASE_MEASUREMENT_ID__|'$FIREBASE_MEASUREMENT_ID'|g' dist/app.js && sed -i 's|__FIREBASE_API_KEY__|'$FIREBASE_API_KEY'|g' dist/index.js && sed -i 's|__FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN__|'$FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN'|g' dist/index.js && sed -i 's|__FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID__|'$FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID'|g' dist/index.js && sed -i 's|__FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET__|'$FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET'|g' dist/index.js && sed -i 's|__FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID__|'$FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID'|g' dist/index.js && sed -i 's|__FIREBASE_APP_ID__|'$FIREBASE_APP_ID'|g' dist/index.js && sed -i 's|__FIREBASE_MEASUREMENT_ID__|'$FIREBASE_MEASUREMENT_ID'|g' dist/index.js
